dependencies.description:
PROJ is a generic coordinate transformation software, that transforms
geospatial coordinates from one coordinate reference system (CRS) to
another. This includes cartographic projections as well as geodetic
transformations.
dependencies.name: proj

dependencies.description:
Certifi: A carefully curated collection of Root Certificates for
validating the trustworthiness of SSL certificates while verifying the
identity of TLS hosts.
dependencies.name: py-certifi

dependencies.description: The Cython compiler for writing C extensions for the Python language.
dependencies.name: py-cython

dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependent_to.description:
Wavelet and simulated Annealing SliP inversion (WASP). This code uses a
nonlinear simulated annealing inversion method to model slip amplitude,
rake, rupture time, and rise time on a discretized fault plane, finding
the solution that best fits the observations in the wavelet domain.
dependent_to.name: neic-finitefault

dependent_to.description:
The matplotlib basemap toolkit is a library for plotting 2D data on maps
in Python.
dependent_to.name: py-basemap

dependent_to.description: Cartopy - a cartographic python library with matplotlib support.
dependent_to.name: py-cartopy

dependent_to.description: An analysis environment for satellite and other earth observation data.
dependent_to.name: py-datacube

dependent_to.description: Tool to convert geopandas vector data into rasterized xarray data.
dependent_to.name: py-geocube

dependent_to.description:
GeoPandas is an open source project to make working with geospatial data
in python easier. GeoPandas extends the datatypes used by pandas to
allow spatial operations on geometric types. Geometric operations are
performed by shapely. Geopandas further depends on fiona for file access
and descartes and matplotlib for plotting.
dependent_to.name: py-geopandas

dependent_to.description:
A Python library designed to make data analysis and visualization
seamless and simple.
dependent_to.name: py-geoviews

dependent_to.description:
Collection of tools for reading, visualizing and performing calculations
with weather data.
dependent_to.name: py-metpy

dependent_to.description:
OWSLib is a Python package for client programming with Open Geospatial
Consortium (OGC) web service (hence OWS) interface standards, and their
related content models.
dependent_to.name: py-owslib

dependent_to.description:
TorchGeo: datasets, samplers, transforms, and pre-trained models for
geospatial data.
dependent_to.name: py-torchgeo

description:
Python interface to PROJ (cartographic projections and coordinate
transformations library).
name: py-pyproj

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
